attributes.additional_details:
For far too long a superstitious dogma from 2000 years ago has clouded the running of our Parliament. Religion is out-dated and of no use in an era of science...it's highly questionable stances cloud rational thought and modern morality, An individual should be free to practise, however Parliament should avoid any interaction or influence.

1) Abolition of the Lords Spiritual in the House of Lords.
2) A clear change to Uk law, ensuring the separation of Religion from the State.
3) Removal of the Queen as either Head of Parliament, or Head of the Church.
